title: Where?
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 35 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: Where? is the question repeatedly asked by the lost little bear as he looks for his mother, father, house, bed, and pot of honey. The endearing illustrations and repetitive pattern will help early readers understand the simple questions.
reviewWords: bear, brown, father, honey, house, mother
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Identify story problem and solution
awareness: Blend Onset and Rime                : Blend onset and rime
phonics: Consonants : Associate the letter Bb with the sound /b/
grammar: Punctuation                : Identify asking and telling sentences
